paymenttest.title: Payment Tests
paymenttest.subtitle: Make test payments to verify PayPal integration
paymenttest.form.title: Create Test Payment
paymenttest.form.info: A PayPal window will open to complete the payment
paymenttest.success.title: Payment Completed
paymenttest.success.message: The payment has been captured successfully.
paymenttest.error.noConfigMessage: First you must configure at least one PayPal account in the Payment Methods module.
paymenttest.error.noCompany: Could not get company ID. Please log in again.
paymenttest.history.title: Transaction History
paymenttest.details.title: Transaction Details
paymenttest.instructions.title: Instructions
paymenttest.instructions.step1: Create order: Enter an amount and create the payment order
paymenttest.instructions.step2: Approve on PayPal: A PayPal Sandbox window will open
paymenttest.instructions.step3: Capture payment: Once approved, capture the payment to complete it
paymenttest.instructions.note: Make sure your PayPal configuration is in Sandbox mode for testing.
